heading: What is Duckies?
content: Duckies is a community project built on the Binance Smart Chain (BSC) with $DUCKIE as its ecosystem token. We are a community driven project bringing the adoption of Duckies NFT integration and gamification on the platform (P2E)

heading: What is the ecosystem token?
content: $DUCKIE is the ecosystem token. It is listed on Pancakeswap (the leading DEX on the BSC network)

heading: Is the liquidity locked?
content: Yes! We have locked our liquidity for 2 years and we plan on extending it as soon as the unlock period reaches. This is to assure our investors that we are not a "rugpull" scheme

heading: Will there be token burn?
content: Yes! We have commited 20% of our token to burn

heading: How can I help?
content: You can help by joining our ever growing community, refer your friends and help shill us on social media

heading: What are the plans for the future?
content: Duckies community is commited to building value. We have plans to create our P2E game, NFT release and NFT marketplace to support the ecosystem
